thread.section_title: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brushy Mountain Bee Farm | brushymountainbeefarm.com
thread.title: BILL MCLAUGHLIN
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by BILL MCLAUGHLIN

author: BILL MCLAUGHLIN
title: BILL MCLAUGHLIN
text: Good treatment, no friction. I am an old customer returning to beekeeping after a number of years. Bought the starter kit ( I had given everything away some years ago) already preassembled. I would have perfered my own assembly. The 6 corners on the 4 hive bodies were starting to curl out so I had to work glue down into developing cracks and clamp. I also had to use a wood plane on all 4 boxes to reduce the gaps when the boxes sat on top of each other. Other than that a good experience.
